Summary: Test-NBEC-10040-Desktop-verify When a user who has added an item to their basket on the Ecommerce website navigates to the marketing website using any of the links on eComm, then a cookie is passed to the marketing site which contains the number of items in the basket
Action:
Open any applicable browser (eg. Chrome) on Desktop and launch the Canon  Store portal using below TST url:
https://canon-b2c-store-tst.mobify-storefront.com/s
Result:
The Canon Store portal should get open on chrome browser (Desktop) and Design should appear as per Design guidelines for Desktop 

Reference link  - SFCC PDP Cameras + Lens Page Templates (adobe.com)

Action: Verify if a cookie is passed to the marketing site which contains the number of items in the basket when user adds an item in basket using ecomm website
Result: user shpuld navigates to the marketing website using any of the links on eComm, then a cookie should be  passed to the marketing site which contains thenumber of items in the basket

Summary: Test-NBEC-10040-Desktop-The Cookie will expire on the marketing in the same time frame as the corresponding cookie for the profile on the eCommerce site:
Action:
Open any applicable browser (eg. Chrome) on Desktop and launch the Canon  Store portal using below TST url:
https://canon-b2c-store-tst.mobify-storefront.com/s
Result:
The Canon Store portal should get open on chrome browser (Desktop) and Design should appear as per Design guidelines for Desktop 

Reference link  - SFCC PDP Cameras + Lens Page Templates (adobe.com)

Action: verify if The Cookie will expire on the marketing in the same time frame as the corresponding cookie for the profile on the eCommerce site:
Result:
The Cookie will expire on the marketing in the same time frame as the corresponding cookie for the profile on the eCommerce site:

Guest Profile: the cookie information is stored for a duration of 30 days. After this, the cookie expires

Logged in users: the cookie information is stored for a duration of 30 days. After this, the cookie expires

Cookie expiry date is counted from the last update to the basket date
